attributes.action: Take us out of the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We cannot afford to be part of Europe any more, we should spend the money that Europe steal from us each year to put it back into Britain, and for the British Public to use instead of the Germans and the French.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
